title: My controls are busted......
body: So yesterday, I logged on to league and played normal match but for some strange reason my controls and camera stuff aren't working.  My camera lock doesn't properly stay on my champion whether or not I use the camera lock at the bottom screen or press my camera lock key.  It keeps making me hold the key and it really affects my gameplay... Also I can't access the mini-map camera thing are all as well as me not being able the switch around my items and being forced to double click everything when I didn't have to before.  I don't know what's going on at all, my pings are all weird, my mini map is broken, i can't use my shop effectively, my items can't be switched around and the worse part is that my camera lock is broken......... How can I fix this???

replies.body:
Let's go ahead and try resetting your config files since so many aspects don't seem to be working the way you remember anymore. Follow these steps, then afterwards make sure you setup the keybindings you want again.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
